meanings.definition: An extraordinary or remarkable event or occurrence.
meanings.sent1: The meteor shower was a superphenomenon that amazed everyone.
meanings.sent2: Witnessing a shooting star is a rare superphenomenon.
meanings.sent3: The talking dog at the circus was a superphenomenon that made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her sudden recovery from a serious illness was a superphenomenon that defied all odds.
meanings.sent5: The solar eclipse was a superphenomenon that left a lasting impression on the spectators.

meanings.definition: Something that is beyond the ordinary or usual.
meanings.sent1: The discovery of a new species was a superphenomenon in the scientific community.
meanings.sent2: Experiencing a rainbow after a storm is a natural superphenomenon.
meanings.sent3: The cat's ability to open doors on its own was a superphenomenon in the household.
meanings.sent4: The growth of a plant in the desert was a superphenomenon of resilience.
meanings.sent5: The synchronized swimming performance was a superphenomenon of grace and skill.
